hero.subtitle: Hi, I'm Jay, a software engineer. I love building things that make a difference.

descriptions.python: Proficient in using Python for backend development and scripting.
descriptions.fastapi: Proficient in building APIs with FastAPI.
descriptions.django: Skilled in web development using Django framework.
descriptions.postgreSQL: Experienced in database management with PostgreSQL.
descriptions.redis: Experienced in using Redis for caching and data storage.
descriptions.messageQueues: Familiar with message queue systems like RabbitMQ and Kafka.
descriptions.react: Experienced in building user interfaces with React.
descriptions.js: Proficient in JavaScript, including ES6+ features.
descriptions.ts: Strong understanding of TypeScript for type-safe development.
descriptions.nodejs: Skilled in server-side development with Node.js.
descriptions.TailwindCSS: Proficient in using Tailwind CSS for styling.
descriptions.AWS: Familiar with AWS services for cloud computing.
descriptions.Firebase: Familiar with Firebase for backend services and real-time databases.
descriptions.CICD: Experienced in automating workflows with GitHub Actions.
